name: tien-lo-than-game
description: Web game tu luyện với giao diện tương tự như hình ảnh

scripts.build: npx prisma generate && npx nuxt@3.8.0 build
scripts.vercel-build: npx prisma generate && npx nuxt@3.8.0 build
scripts.postinstall: npx prisma generate || echo 'Prisma generate failed but continuing'
scripts.deploy:check: echo 'Checking if deployment is needed...' && git diff --name-only HEAD~1 HEAD | grep -E '^(pages|components|stores|server|composables|utils|prisma|nuxt.config|package.json|vercel.json|tailwind.config|app.vue|assets)/' && echo 'Deployment needed' || echo 'No deployment needed'
